tuv.seg: Skábmajazz Anáris: Sámeartisttaid násttit lávddi alde Sajosis
Famous Sámi Musicians in Sajos During Kaamosjazz Festival

Skábmajazz fállá harmonalaš eahketkonsearttaid, heahkas jamiid sihke sámemusihkkai deattuhuvvan eahkeda Sámekulturguovddáš Sajosis Anáris skábmamánu 21. beaivve 2015 dmu 17. Sámeartisttaid násttit Hilda Länsman ja Wimme Saari loaiddasteaba bändiin Sajosa konsearttas.
Famous traditional Sámi artists Hilda Länsman and Wimme Saari will perform in Sámi Cultural Center Sajos auditorium in Inari on Saturday 21.11.2015.
Bivnnut juoigi Wimme Saari lea badjánan málmmibeakkánin laktimiin modearna mášenelemeanttaid boares juoiganteknihkaidda.
Joik artist Wimme Saari has become world famous with his original style in traditional Sámi music.
Wimme juigosiin leat nannosit ovdan olbmot, eallit ja luondu.
In his music he mixes old joiking technics with modern electronic elements.
Su lassin Sajosa lávddi alde loaiddasta Hilda Länsman.
Nature, animals and people are strongly present in his joiks.
Son lea 22-jahkásaš artista ja lávllaráhkadeaddji, guhte bođii dovddusin UMK-lávlungilvvu mielde giđđat 2015, go loaiddastii euroviisurátkimiid finálas ovttas etniinis Ulla Pirttijärvi-Länsmaniin.

Hilda Länsman is a young Sámi singer and song writer, who became known in Finland, when she took part in Eurovision qualification song contest UMK, with her mother Ulla Pirttijärvi-Länsman, in spring 2015.

Bileahtat: ovddalgihtii 25 €, uvssa luhtte 30 € Sámekulturguovddáš Sajos, Anár +358 (0) 10 839 3168 ja www.lipputoimisto.fi Bileahttavuovdin uvssa luhtte álggahuvvo diimmu ovdal konseartta, juos bileahtat leat vel fállun.
Tickets: 25 € when bought in advance.
Juos háliidat várret báikki jorrestullui, váldde oktavuođa šleađgapoasttain čujuhussii sajos (a) samediggi.
30 € on the day of the concert (sold one hour before the concert starts from Sajos Info).

fi dahje telefovnnain 050- 565 1346 Sáhtu birra Suoločielggis Sámekulturguovddáš Sajosa konsertii almmuhuvvo maŋŋá. Lassidieđut Sámekulturguovddáš Sajos, Anár, t. +358 (0)10 839 3168, sajos (at) samediggi.
Tickets for the concert are available from Sámi Cultural Center Sajos, Inari, tel: +358 (0) 10 839 3168 or www.lipputoimisto.fi
